entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers and risk of freezing rain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
